She has been selling clothes in the market at retail for four years, working seven days a week. She does not have any other sources of income. She has requested a loan of UGX 800,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to buy more skirts, blouses and dresses for sale. Her challenges include seasonality. Her dream is to own a big clothes store selling many varieties of clothing. She joined MCDT because of a good working relationship that the staff members have with their borrowers. She stays with her husband in their house with access to both electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bales of used skirts, blouses and dresses for sale.

loans.name: Lea

texts.en:
Lea  lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children, all of whom attend school. She is also looking after two of her nieces. She has been selling Cavendish bananas at the market at retail for ten years, working six days a week. She also runs a greengrocery as another source of income. She has requested a loan of Ug.Shs 1,200,000 from MCDT- SACCO to be able to buy more Cavendish bananas, and stock the grocery with more tomatoes, green peppers, bitter tomatoes, mangoes, passion fruit and pineapples. 

Lea's challenges include seasonality and transportation. Her dream is to expand her business to being able to sell more fruit at both retail and wholesale.  She joined MCDT-SACCO because of low interest charged on loans and because it is much easier to join MCDT than to join other financial organizations in her area of residence. She owns a house with access to electricity but no piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of Cavendish bananas.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has four children, two of whom attend school. She is also looking after her sister. She has been operating a restaurant in a rented place for six years, working six days a week. She also offers outside catering as another source of income. She has requested a loan of UgShs 500,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to stock more food stuffs like rice, flour, dry beans and peas, spices, and cooking fat to use in the restaurant. Her challenges include seasonality, thieves and transportation. Her dream is to accumulate profits to enable her to buy land and put up premises for both residences and businesses. She joined MCDT because she did not have enough capital to sustain and expand her business. She and her husband rent a house with access to electricity but not piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy more food stuffs like rice, flour, dry beans and peas, spices, and cooking fat to use in the restaurant.

loans.name: Melody

texts.en:
Melody is earning in her buy-and-sell business, selling cosmetic products as an aid to her husband's income from working as a driver. With her generated income, she had successfully repaid her previous loan used in her business. 

She took a new loan to buy more variety of cosmetics to resell in order to gain more returns. Using her motorcycle, she was able to vend her stock in the neighboring places.  

Melody wants to improve the general living situation of her family in the near future.

loans.use: to buy more variety of cosmetics to resell.

loans.name: Gemmalyn

texts.en:
Gemmalyn is 22 years old and married. She has one child, who is in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.  Gemmalyn has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Gemmalyn has been in this business for two years.  In the future, Gemmalyn would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Marika

texts.en: Marika is a 28-year-old woman from the Chiatura district. Marika is unemployed and has two children. She married at an early age and wasn’t able to get an education so she has no university degree, which is one of the main reasons for her unemployment. She looks after her children and stays home, but she has a great desire to be involved in the clothes-trading business. Marika couldn’t request a loan from financial institutions until the start up program began, which is a joint product of Kiva and Credo. She requested a loan of 1,100 USD to begin trading in clothing and bedclothes. She plans to go to Turkey and purchase the products at wholesale prices and then resell them among her friends and villagers. This will give her a chance to earn income and not to depend on her parents. Marika will provide a better future for her children.

loans.use: to begin trade in clothes

loans.name: Vardan

texts.en:
Vardan is 29 years old and lives in Dilijan city. He lives with his brother and retired father. Since school, the only occupation that he has been engaged in is farming. On his farm, he has four cows and two calves. The only farm product he sells is milk. For Vardan, it is very difficult to sustain his family's needs alone. Both his father and brother are unemployed. They have plans to enlarge the farm, but the lack of money makes Vardan postpone all the plans and be satisfied with what he has at this moment. 

Vardan is asking for a loan of 600.000 Armenian drams in order to buy several calves and hay, which will be fodder for his farm animals. He really hopes that this hard period is just a start-up for him and this loan will help him have a richer farm and more income than he has now.

loans.use: to buy several calves and hay

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fufu for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy extra charcoal to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cold water for her business.

loans.name: Faina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Faina de 40 años de edad, estudio hasta 3º grado, esta casada, su esposo trabaja de motorista, tiene 3 hijos de los cuales 2 estudian y el otro ya esta acompañado y tiene su propio hogar. Ella vive con su mamà. Solamente 3 personas dependen de ella. Faina se ha dedicado a la venta de ropa y lo ha hecho por mas de 10 años; lo hizo por inicativa propia y lo hizo para mejorar sus ingresos economicos, otro ingreso economico es el del esposo. No habia otro negocio antes. La distancia no se puede medir porque se va a los pueblos a vender ropa y viaja en bus, la apoyan sus hijos y su horario es variado. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar medicamentos para ella. El préstamo le mejorara ya que podra tener buena salud para seguir trabajando, y por lo tanto la calidad de vida sera mejor. La necesidad satisfecha es que se sentira muy bien para seguir en la lucha. Sus sueños son seguir trabajando para sostener la familia mientras ellos estudian y se preparan academicamente.
texts.en:
Faina is 40 years old. She went to school until the third grade. Her husband works as a driver. She has three children, two of whom are in school. Her third child is already in a relationship and has his own home. Faina lives with her mother. Three people depend on Faina.

Faina has worked selling clothing for ten years. She started this business on her own initiative to improve her family’s income. Their other income is that of her husband. Faina did not have a business before this one. Faina travels a lot of distance by bus to other towns to sell clothing. She supports her children, and her schedule is varied.

Faina is requesting this loan from CrediCampo to buy medication for herself. The loan will help her improve her health so that she can continue working and have a better quality of life. With this necessity satisfied, she will feel better to go on fighting. Her dream is to continue working to support her family while they study and prepare themselves academically.

loans.use: to buy medication for herself.

loans.name: Nicolas

texts.es:
Nicolas de 77 años de edad, estudio hasta 2º grado, esta acompañado, su pareja trabaja en hacer tortillas para vender. Tiene dos hijos de 35 y 31 años de edad, uno ya tiene su propio hogar y el otro trabaja de jornalero con él.

Nicolas trabaja en la agricultura, lo ha hecho por mas de 50 años; lo aprendio de su padre y decidio hacerlo para tener siempre granos basicos, no ha tenido otro negocio, el lugar de trabajo esta como a 2 km de su casa y viaja en carreta o a pie lo apoya un hijo y su señora. Su horario es variado de 6:00 am a 12:00 md. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar abono, herbicidas, pesticidas, semillas, etc. El préstamo le mejorara porque puede tener disponible los insumos y eso le permitira trabajar para tener granos básicos y por lo tanto su calidad de vida sera mejor. La necesidad satisfecha es tener los insumos para seguir adelante. 

Sus sueños son seguir trabajando mientras Dios le preste vida y apoyar a su familia.  Las ganancias las utiliza para su familia y para ir pagando el préstamo, seguira luchando siempre que Credicampo le siga prestando y lo lograra con el apoyo de su familia.
texts.en:
Nicolas, 77 years old,  studied to the 2nd grade and is married. His wife makes tortillas to sell. They have 2 children, ages 35 and 31, one of whom already has his own home while the other works with Nicolas as a day laborer.

Nicolas works in agriculture, as he has for more than 50 years. He learned it from his father and decided to do this in order to have basic grains. Nicolas has never had another business. His place of work is some 2 kilometers from his house and he travels there in a cart or on foot. His son and his wife help him. His daily schedule varies from 6:00 am to 12:00 midday.

The loan Nicolas requests is for purchasing manure, herbicides, pesticides, seeds, etc. The loan will help him to have available the necessary inputs, and will allow Nicolas to produce basic grains and, at the same time, improve his quality of life. His need is to have the inputs to continue forging ahead. 

Nicolas' dreams are to continue working so long as God gives him life and to help his family. The earnings will be utilized for his family, to continue paying off the loan and struggling so that Credicampo will continue facilitating his loans. Nicolas will achieve this with the help of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure, herbicides, pesticides, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to replenish her grocery with popular drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition and purchase education equipment

loans.name: Vazgen

texts.en:
Vazgen lives in the village of Ddmashen in Gegharkunik region. He is 68 years old. He lives with his wife and school-aged son. Vazgen has done different jobs, but for the last 20 years, he has been engaged in farming and agriculture. On his farm, he has 2 cows, a calf, 2 piglets and 10 chickens.  All of his farm goods including milk, a great range of dairy products made by his wife, eggs and meat, Vazgen sells to his already loyal customers. 

Vazgen keeps his farm cattle in a barn that he made. It is already 25 years old and he has not been able to repair it. He says that during winter, it is very hard to keep his farm cattle in such conditions.
 
He asks for this loan in order to repair his barn and provide his farm cattle with warmth for the winter period and with comfort for the whole year.

loans.use: to repair his barn

loans.name: Del Futuro Del Manu Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Del Futuro del Manu” y las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Salvación provincia de Manu departamento de Madre de Dios.

Maria Luisa nació en la ciudad de Paucartambo y desde hace 25 años que radica en la ciudad de Salvación. (La ciudad de Salvación está ubicada en el distrito del Manu en la provincia de Manu dentro del departamento de Madre de Dios, Perú). Maria Luisa tiene 39 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella tiene un local de hospedaje, una tienda de abarrotes y un restaurante. Ya son varios años que se dedica a estos negocios y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia pues ella pertenece al banco comunal “Del Futuro del Manu”. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, fideos, tarros de leche y otras cosas más. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.

Este banco comunal está conformado por varias personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los socios se dedican a la agricultura, a la ganadería, al engorde de ganado, a la venta y compra de madera, a la elaboración de artesanía, brindar hospedaje y venta de comida, venta de comestibles y venta de productos agro veterinarios. Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos.
texts.en:
A group of neighbors and friends form the communal bank "Del Futuro del Manu" ("Of the Future of Manu"), and the meetings of the members of this bank are every thirty days in the city of Salvación in the Manu province of the Madre de Dios region. 


Maria Luisa was born in the city of Paucartambo, and for 25 years has lived in the city of Salvación. (The city of Salvación is located in the Manu district of the Manu privince, in the Madre de Dios region of Perú.) Maria Luisa is 39 years old and is in a common-law marriage from which she has two children. She has a lodging house, a grocery store, and a restaurant. She has had these businesses for several years and they are doing well, thanks to the work that she has put into them. She is an entrepreneurial and hardworking woman who has done well for her family by belonging to the communal bank "Del Futuro del Manu." At this time she requests the loan to buy merchandise such as sacks of rice, sugar, noodles, jugs of milk, and other things. She appreciates and values the loan, and promises to make her monthly payments. 


This communal bank is made up of several people who are always looking for opportunities to excel and, with their daily efforts, provide a better life for their children. The members work in agriculture, livestock raising and fattening, buying and selling wood, making crafts, offering lodging, grocery and food sales, and selling veterinary products to farmers. The members all appreciate the opportunity they are being given, and they promise to make their respective payments on the established dates.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as sacks of rice, sugar, noodles, jugs of milk, and other things.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Emendina

texts.en: Emendina owns a retail store within her locality. She has been engaged in this kind of business for five years. She is a 47-year-old single mother with two children who currently go to school. Emendina would like to complete the grocery items she offers so she will encourage more customers and provide them good customer service. To realize her goals she is asking for additional capital of PHP 10,000. She will immediately purchase various kinds of grocery items. In this way, she could obtain greater income and be able to send her children into a higher level of education for a better way of living.

loans.use: to buy stocks of grocery items to sell

loans.name: Guliko

texts.en: Guliko is a 52-year-old married woman from a small village in the Khelvachauri district. She lives with her husband, two children, daughter-in-law, and grandson. Guliko's husband works as a driver for a private company and gets a small monthly income. Guliko has a bakery. She bakes Georgian "Khachapuri" (cheese in bread) and has satisfied clients. She decided to open a cafe near the bakery and increase the number of clients and enlarge the business. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of USD 2,500 for opening a cafe. Guliko is a very hardworking woman who is ready to work harder to increase her income. The Start Up program will be a great support for the family.

loans.use: to open a cafe

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish for her business.

loans.name: Pathani

texts.en: At the age of 32, Pathani is a married woman. She deals in business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 45,000 to purchase more animals. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. She is in her fourth loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.

loans.name: Kehkashan

texts.en: Kehkashan is a 30-year-old married woman. She has three children. She has had a business of hand-embroidery for many years. She is zealous about her work, and client demand is strong.  But business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate her nearly every day. Her embroidery patterns are very popular on her street and she is the best earning resource in her household. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR, to buy raw materials, such as spools of thread, sequins and pearls, in large quantities to meet the increasing demand. She is also interested in opening her own shop in the market to display her work. She is in her 3rd loan cycle, with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as spools of thread, sequins and pearls in large quantities.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cold water, soft drinks, etc, to resell.

loans.name: Mead* Group

texts.en:
The Mead Group consists of four women from Sana'a, Yemen. They requested a loan from AMB for 160,000 YER.

Zahra is the leader of the group. She is a 52 years old, married, and has one child. They live in their own house, which consists of one room, one bathroom, and a small kitchen, in Sana'a, Yemen. Zahra is employed as a cleaner in a private school.  The salary she receives from this job is a small and is not enough to cover all the family's expenses. From this job, Zahra accumulated money and purchased different kinds of women clothes, which she sells door to door. The selling of women clothes is a profitable business for Zahra and it helps her cover the expenses of her home. 

To expand this business, Zahra requested a loan from AMB for 30,000 YER, which she will use to purchase more women clothes to sell to the women in her area. She looks forward to expanding her house to become more spacious and comfortable.

loans.use: to purchase women clothes to sell

loans.name: Kalsoom

texts.en:
Kalsoom is a 44-year-old married woman. She has been running a business selling milk with her husband for many years.

She has two cows in milk and sells their milk to many of the neighbors, along with butter and cheese that she and her husband make from the milk.  She looks after the cattle and performs the task of collecting milk from them. 

She has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation. Currently she is in the second loan cycle and has applied for a loan of PKR 35,000. This will allow her to purchase one more cow. Kalsoom is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her and will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Sumaira

texts.en:
Sumaira is a 22-year-old vigorous lady; she has been stitching clothes for many years with her husband. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. 

However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason, she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of thread in different colors with  packs of laces, zippers, and buttons. 

This will allow her to stitch up more dresses on time to generate a healthier source of income. She is in her fourth loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors with packs of laces, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Sumaira

texts.en:
Sumaira is a 32-year-old married woman. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business selling cloth. She has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good quality fabric in her locality. 

With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business; currently she requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase bundles of cloth in different colors and designs. This will help her to increase her sales, which will ultimately help in generating more income for her. She is in her sixth loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of cloth in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Hajran

texts.en:
Hajran is 44 years old and a married woman. She has four children; one of her sons (shown in the photo) is a rickshaw driver. He earns a good amount of income to contribute in the family income. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years and has become famous in his locality. 

Now he wants to purchase new tires along with some auto spare parts for his vehicle. For this reason Hajran applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR through Kashf Foundation, for her son.  It will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Hajran is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her son and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to purchase new tires along with some auto spare parts.

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en: Bushra, a 40-year-old married woman, runs a small boutique at home to provide for her family. She purchases cloth from the market at low prices, sews it, and then sells the clothing to the people of her locality. She always has a great product selection to offer, and she earns a good income that contributes to her family's well-being. For the improvement of her business, Bushra has requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to buy a greater variety of cloth and spools of thread in various colors. These purchases will allow her to fulfill the demands of her customers on time. With a good credit history, this will be Bushra's seventh loan.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cloth and spools of thread in various colors.

loans.name: Saima

texts.en: Saima is a 31-year-old married woman. She has been running a business manufacturing footballs for many years. She makes balls in different sizes and sells them in her community and in the local market. She has become famous in her town for providing good quality footballs. She earns enough to bear the expenses of her family members. She is contributing much to the family income, as her husband’s income is not sufficient to fulfill the demands of his family members alone. Saima is a motivated mother of three. She is responsible to provide them with good quality food, education and clothing. For the improvement of her business, she applied for a loan of 50,000 (Pakistan rupees). The amount will be used to purchase rubber bladders, leather covers in a large quantity,  with some spools of thread to cater to more customers without delay. She is hopeful to get an increase in her sales, which ultimately will help in generating more cash. She dreams of expanding her business and desires to use part of the profits on her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase rubber bladders for footballs, and leather covers in a large quantity,  with some spools of thread.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 32 years old.  She is married and has four children.  With three children in school, Rowena works very hard to provide for them.  Rowena's business and family home was destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Rowena has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Rowena has taken a PHP 10,000 housing loan through NWTF in order to purchase materials to rebuild her family home. She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Rowenais committed to rebuild her devastated life and in future would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Mnyazi

texts.en:
Mnyazi is a businesswoman who is very hardworking. She is a widowed woman with four children. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Mnyazi has operated a charcoal selling business for the past six years. Her potential clients are neighbours and passersby. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future. 

With the loan, she wants to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more biscuits, soap, etc., for her business

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
For about 10 years Razia, a 55-year-old married woman, has been in the business of hand embroidery. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community, and her designs are much in demand. Razia has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. 

To help her continue operations, Razia has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy reels of threads in various colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones. She hopes to increase her income by targeting more customers, and these purchases will enable her to consistently cater to them.

loans.use: to buy reels of threads in various colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones.

loans.name: Azeeman

texts.en: Azeeman is a 32 year-old married woman. She has seven children. She has run a business selling milk for the last five years. She has five buffaloes and three goats. She earns enough to contribute to the family income. She also sells animals to generate an extra amount of income. In order to make huge profits, she requested a loan of 40000/- PKR to buy two more buffaloes.  She hopes to have an increase in the production capacity of milk which ultimately helps in generating more cash. She dreams of expanding her business in the near future. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy two more buffaloes.

loans.name: María Zoila

texts.es:
María de 61 años de edad, estudio hasta primer grado, es viuda ya que su compañero de vida fallecio; tiene 3 hijos de los cuales 2 tienen sus propios hogares y solamente un hijo vive con ella; pero no depende de ella. 


El negocio de la cliente es un cafetín, tiene un año de trabajar con el cafetín; lo aprendio de una amiga ya que fue ella quien la motivo para este negocio y lo decidio para sostenerse economicamente. Tambien se dedica a lavar ropa a mano por lo cual recibe un pago. No habia otro negocio antes, el cafetín esta en su casa y donde va a lavar esta como a 1 km y viaja a pie. Nadie se involucra en el trabajo. Las lavadas las hace de 6:00 am a 10:00 am y de 11:00 am a 6:00 pm en el cafetín. 

El préstamo que esta soliictando, es para comprar golosinas, bebidas, lácteos, dulces, para vender en el cafetín. El préstamo le mejorara porque surtira el cafetín y por lo tanto le generara mas ganancias y asi mismo su calidad de vida sera mejor. La necesidad satisfecha es que se le de, la oportunidad de seguir trabajando. Sus sueños son seguir trabajando hasta que Dios le preste vida. En cuanto a u familia que luchen por sus hijos.
texts.en:
María, 61, went to school through the first grade.  She's a widow since her life partner passed away.  She has 3 children; two have their own homes, and only one son lives with her but is not dependent.

María's business is a cafe, which she's been working in for a year.  She got the idea from a friend that encouraged her to go into the business, and she decided to do it to support herself financially.   She also hand-washes clothing for pay.  She had never had a business before.  The cafe is in her house and she goes a kilometer away by foot to the place where she washes clothes.  There's no one else involved with her business.  She does the washing from 6AM to 10AM and works in the cafe from 11AM to 6PM.  

The loan María is seeking is to buy candy, soft drinks, dairy products, and desserts to sell in the cafe.  The loan will mean progress for her because she'll stock up the cafe, generate more profits, and her quality of life will be better.  Her needs will be met in that she'll have the opportunity to continue with her work.  Her dreams are to keep on working for as long as God gives her life and that her family will strive on behalf of their own children.

loans.use: to buy candy, drinks, dairy products, and desserts to sell in her cafe.

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en: Zahida, age 32, is a married woman. She has two children.  She deals in the business of selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, raises them and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase more animals. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.

loans.name: Shahida

texts.en: Shahida is a 24 year-old married woman. She has been in the business of running a beauty parlor for about four years. She offers many facilities to her customers, such as makeup, hair styling, facials, skin polish, etc. Through her very good services she has become very famous in her street. In order to meet with the increasing demands of her customers, she is interested in buying more variety of cosmetics products for the parlor.  For this reason she applied a loan of 45,000 PKR to buy hair care products, skin products and creams of bleaching and whitening in large quantities. She is hopeful to cater to more customers time after time. She dreams of expanding her business in the near future.

loans.use: to buy hair care products, skin products and creams of bleaching and whitening in large quantities.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase wholesale fish.

loans.name: Ghada

texts.en:
Ghada is a 30-year-old married woman from Gaza city. She is the mother of two sons and one daughter. All of them are under 18 years old. Her husband works as an employee in the public sector, where he earns a low income. 

For the past two years, Ghada has been working in sewing clothes in a small room in her house. It is a good business and earns a good income. She helps her husband in part of the family expenses. 

Ghada took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more textiles for her sewing workshop. By taking this loan, Ghada will be able to increase her productivity and also her income. 

Ghada appears in the photo while she is working.

loans.use: to buy more textiles for her sewing workshop.

loans.name: Nusrat

texts.en:
Nusrat is 36 years old and married. She has four children. She is striving hard to meet their demands, including food, clothing, and health. Her husband is employed in a small restaurant. His income is not sufficient to meet the daily expenditures of the family. 

Nusrat started her business of tailoring to contribute to the family income. She is well-familiar with the stitching techniques. She initiated her business with the support of Kashf Foundation; she took her first loan to buy a sewing machine. At present, she enjoys a great client list and has gained a lot of appreciation and popularity in her community. 

Nusrat requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy a stock of threads in different colors, along with packs of buttons and needles. So, then she would be able to meet the demands of her customers without fail.  

She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children, through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of threads in different colors, along with packs of buttons and needles.

loans.name: Ferzana

texts.en:
Ferzana is a 24-year-old married woman. For the past eight years, she has been selling spices (used in food for taste) with her husband, who is also shown in the photo. 

She purchases spices in bulk from the wholesale market and then sells them in packs of various sizes. She has become famous by providing good-quality spices in her locality and earns enough to have a decent life. 

She is a responsible mother of two children and needs to earn more to bear the daily expenditures of her family members. For this reason, she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy a stock of salt, red chilies, black pepper and turmeric in large quantity. 

She is in her fourth loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior. She wishes to utilize her earned profit on her children’s education and well-being.

loans.use: to buy a stock of salt, red chilies, black pepper and turmeric in large quantity.

loans.name: Hokimoy

texts.ru: Хокимой 37-летняя замужняя женщина из района А.Джоми. Она вместе с мужем планирует начать новый бизнес, чтобы обеспечить самих себя работой, а семью источником дохода. Хокимой давно интересуется продажей продуктов питания. Накопив сбережение, они приобрели помещение под магазин, построили там полки и сейчас занимаются его оформлением. Однако, чтобы закупить товар им не хватает собственных средств. Хокимой решила получить кредит, так как она долго шла к своей цели и теперь стремится реализовать ее. У Хокимой четверо сыновей и одна дочь. Она с мужем старается ради детей, чтобы у них было хорошее будущее. Их семья полагается на финансовую поддержку, чтобы начать семейный торговый бизнес.
texts.en: Hokimoy is a 37-year-old married woman from the A. Jomi District. Together with her husband, she is planning to start a new business so that they can provide work for themselves and provide their family with a source of income. Hokimoy has long been interested in selling groceries. Setting aside savings, the couple bought the premises under a store, built shelves there and now they are in the process of stocking the store. However, they do not have enough personal funds to buy merchandise. Hokimoy decided to take out a loan, as she has been working toward her goal for a long time and now is aiming to finally accomplish it. Hokimoy has four sons and one daughter. She and her husband strive to do all that they can for their children so that they will have a good future. Their family relies on this financial support in order to start their family retail business.

loans.use: to buy food products so she can open her store.

loans.name: Amigos Triunfadores Group

texts.es: “LOS AMIGOS TRIUNFADORES” es uno de los grupos muy unidos y responsables en sus cuotas. Margarita tiene 70 años de edad es casada. Ella implemento su bodega hace muchos al cual se dedica. Y a la vez preparada empanadas  pay de manzana queques para expenderlos a sus conocidos y público. En sus tiempos libres vende productos de belleza. Es de esa manera que puede trabajar a sus 70 años. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más productos para su bodega azúcar arroz aceite y bebidas. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo bridado. Margarita es la segunda persona sentada del lado derecho viste chaleco negro.
texts.en:
“LOS AMIGOS TRIUNFADORES” is a group that is one of the most united and responsible in meeting payments. Margarita is 70 years old and married. She started her grocery store a long time ago and this is how she makes her living. She also makes empanadas, apple pies and cakes to sell to her friends and the public. In her free time she sells beauty products. This is how she is able to work at 70 years of age. 

Margarita will put the loan towards purchasing stock for her grocery store: sugar, rice, oil and beverages. The group is thankful to KIVA investors for the loans offered. Margarita is the second person seated on the right wearing a black vest.

loans.use: to purchase more stock: sugar, rice, oil and beverages.

loans.name: Teegawende Group

texts.fr:
Mme KOUDEMA représente le groupe TEEGAWENDE. Mariée, elle est mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 27ans et le moins âgé a 18ans. 04 vont  à l’école.
Mme fait la restauration depuis 11ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur. 
Elle veut s’acheter 01sac d’haricot, 01bidon d’huile (20l) et une rangée de bois.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut réinvestir dans son activité. Mme ambitionne  agrandir son champ d’activité et mieux entretenir ses enfants.
texts.en:
Koudema is the representative of the Teegawende group. She is married and the mother of 4 children, the oldest of whom is 27 and the youngest of whom is 18. Koudema has been in the restaurant business for 11 years. She purchases her merchandise at the market in her region.

Koudema wants to purchase 1 bag of beans, 1 barrel of oil (20L) and one row of wood. With her profits, she would like to reinvest in her business. Koudema's ambition is to expand her line of business and to better provide for her children.

loans.use: to purchase 1 bag of beans, 1 barrel of oil (20L) and one row of wood

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana tiene 44 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 18 años y 14 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. Ana es una mujer muy trabajadora quien lava y plana ajeno 4 días a las semana y vende variedad de verduras. Ella hace todo por llevar el sustento a sus hijos y darles lo necesario. Ana solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo de su vivienda que se encuentra deteriorado. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, madera y polines.
texts.en:
Ana is 44 years years old and lives in her own house with her two children aged 18 and 14 years old, both are currently studying. Ana is a very hard worker who washes and irons for others 4 days a week and sells a variety of vegetables. She does all this to provide for her children and meet their everyday needs. 

Ana is asking FUSAI for this loan to go towards repairing the roof of her house which has deteriorated. She will purchase galvanised sheet metal, timber and support beams.

loans.use: to buy: galvanised sheet metal, timber and support beams to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru: Гулмира молодая девушка из маленького района Гончи. Ей 24 года. Она живет в дружной семье. Гулмира решила начать новый бизнес. Она будет заниматься скотоводством. 60% населения Таджикистана занимаются сельскохозяйственной деятельностью, ведь 93% Таджикистана занимают горы, и климат прекрасно подходит для таких длительностей. Гулмира не стала отставать от соседей и тоже начала деятельность в этом направлении. Она решилась взять кредит и на заемные деньги купит телят, чтобы начать бизнес.
texts.en: Gulmira is a young woman from the tiny Gonchi District. She is 24 years old. She lives in a close-knit family. Gulmira decided to start her own business. She will run a cattle breeding business. Sixty percent of the population of Tajikistan runs agricultural businesses. Even though 93% of Tajikistan is covered in mountains, it has an ideal climate for running these types of businesses. Wanting to keep up with her neighbors, Gulmira also began a business in this sphere. She decided to take out a loan. With the borrowed money, she will buy a calves in order to start her business.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Bibisalima

texts.ru: Бибисалима простая сельская женщина с открытой душой. Она с четырьмя детьми проживает в районе Вахш. Ее муж находится на заработках в России. Бибисалиме 45 лет. Она на протяжении более 8 лет занимается скотоводством. Ей помогают в этом старшие дети. Бибисалима разводит и мелкорогатый и крупнорогатый скот. Она знает все тонкости этого дела. На данный момент в ее скотном дворе осталось всего пару скотов. Она хочет увеличить их поголовья, так как сейчас хорошее время для выращивания скотов, поскольку на местных пастбищах растут свежие травы. Пользуясь этим случаем Бибисалима просит кредит, чтобы закупить пару голов ягнят и козлят. Этот кредит ей важен.
texts.en: Bibisalima is a simple country woman with a kind heart. She and her four children live in the Vakhsh District. Her husband works abroad in Russia. Bibisalima is 45 years old. For more than 8 years she has been practicing cattle breeding. Her older children help her with this. Bibisalima raises both sheep and cattle. She knows all the nuances of this business. She currently only has a pair of animals in her barnyard. She wants to increase her herd, as it is now a good time for raising cattle as fresh grass is growing in the local pastures. Taking advantage of this opportunity, Bibisalima is requesting a loan to buy a pair of lambs and young goats. This loan is very important to her.

loans.use: to buy a pair of lambs and baby goats to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos vive en Lima en la casa de su hermana mayor, el esta cerca de concluir sus estudios técnicos en electrotecnia industrial los cuales estuvo siguiendo con apoyo de su familia y de lo que gana en su trabajo a medio tiempo como vigilante nocturno de un establecimiento comercial, sin embargo esto no sera posible sin el apoyo de los prestamistas de Kiva debido a que problemas económicos han impedido que su familia pueda seguir ayudándolo este ciclo a solventar sus estudios.
Su meta es poder concluir sus estudios, trabajar duro para ser el mejor en su profesión e innovar la industria.
Juan Carlos agradece el apoyo de los prestamistas de Kiva en este momento decisivo que le permitirá terminar con éxito sus estudios.
El esta convencido en que el primer paso hacia el desarrollo de una sociedad mejor es el acceso a la educación, por lo cual agradece en nombre de todos los estudiantes tan loable tarea.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos lives in Lima in his older sister’s house.  He is close to finishing his technical studies in industrial electrical engineering.  He has been keeping up with his studies with support from his family and with what he earns at his part time work as a night time security guard at a commercial establishment.  Nevertheless, this would not be possible without the support of the Kiva lenders.  This is because financial problems have prevented his family from being able to continue helping him pay for this educational cycle.

His goal is to be able to complete his education and to work hard in order to be the best in his profession and to innovate the industry.

Juan Carlos is grateful for the support of the Kiva lenders at this decisive time.  It will allow him to successfully complete his studies.

He is convinced that the first step towards developing a better society is access to education.  Therefore, he is grateful in the name of all of the students for such commendable work.

loans.use: to pay for his industrial electrical engineering studies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials (zinc, beams, and more).

loans.name: Rosevida

texts.en:
Rosevida is 43 years old, married and has eight children. Four of her children are in school. Rosevida and her family survived super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines on November 8, 2013, but her business and family home was wiped out. She is taking out a housing loan amounting to PHP 7,825 to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. 

Rosevida has been an NWTF borrower since 2012. She plans to recover through her food vending business. With your help, Rosevida can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of super typhoon Haiyan. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Lauratu

texts.en:
Lauratu is 39 years old, married to a trader, and has four children. In 1999, Lauratu established her "gara" (locally dyed) textiles business. She began this business because she wanted to be self-employed and believed that she could earn enough income to help her husband provide a livelihood for their family. Working six days a week and 10 hours a day, Lauratu earns about 442,600 SLL a month. She makes good quality "gara" clothing and does her business by public transport twice in a month. 

Lauratu is requesting a loan of 5,000,000 SLL, which she will use to buy "brilliant" fabric and quality dye. She is planning to acquire a strategic spacious business place. During the rainy season sales are normally slow and production of gara clothing is small. Though the sales are sometimes slow, she has loyal customers from different towns who buy large quantities of goods.

Lauratu used the proceeds of her last loan to provide a livelihood for her family and pay school fees for her children. She did not encounter any major problem in repaying the loan. She was not able to start the planned house construction because she did not make enough profit to do so. She still plans to construct a house, open a saving account, pay her way for a pilgrimage to Mecca (Holy Land), and support her children's education. Lauratu is very determined and hopes to continue working hard to pay off her loans so that she can access more loans.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and dye for her business.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.es:
Rosalinda de 53 años de edad, por motivos de escasos recursos económicos no pudo continuar con sus estudios, y decidió dedicarse al trabajo de elaboración de alimentos.  Ella es casada su esposo trabaja en la agricultura y en la ganadería, tiene 5 hijos.

Ella tiene 25 años de experiencia de dedicarse al trabajo de vender comida, ya que ella tiene un puesto de venta en el mercado, ella decidió dedicarse a este trabajo ya que su mamá cuando estaba pequeña la inducia a este tipo de trabajo.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar una refrigeradora,  4 mesas y una cocina, para ofrecerles un mejor servicio a sus clientes.

Ella a futuro desea tener un negocio en buenas condiciones, que le permita brindarles un mejor servicio a sus clientes, y así obtener una mejor rentabilidad de su negocio para ayudarle al estudio a sus 2 hijos que están estudiando.
texts.en:
Rosalinda is 53 years old and because of limited economic means was never able to continue school.  She decided to work making food.  She is married and her husband works in agriculture and livestock.  They have five children.

Rosalinda has 25 years of experience selling food, since she has a stall in the market. She decided to work in this area since her mother encouraged her to pursue it when she was young.

The loan that she is requesting through KIVA partner CREDICAMPO will be used to buy a refrigerator, four tables, and a stove in order to offer better service to her customers.  

In the future she hopes to have her business in better conditions, which will allow her to offer better service to her customers and thereby obtain a better income. This will help her provide education for her two children who are in school.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator, four tables, and a stove

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es: Doña Dominga gracias a su primer financiamiento logro comprar los fertilizantes necesarios que fueron aplicados en sus cultivos de café los cuales desarrollaron muy bien su función protegiendo la planta, el grano y manteniendo la tierra bien cuidada. Además ella logro pagar mano de obra calificada con la cual asistió la plantación limpiando de maleza la propiedad y los insumos comprados. Gracias a ello su producción de café fue un éxito logrando vender el grano a muy buen precio en el mercado y entre los intermediarios de la zona con lo cual percibió ingresos que fueron utilizados para pagar el compromiso con la institución entre otros compromisos que anteriormente no podía salir. Actualmente solicita nuevamente ser apoyada por los diferentes inversionistas en la plataforma de Kiva para nuevamente invertir en sus cultivos de café los cuales después de la corta del grano y recolección del mismo quedaron deteriorados y expuestos a ser contagiados por la roya o por plagas que conlleven a la tala de los mismos una vez dañados. Es por esa razón que ella solicita un nuevo financiamiento con el cual comprara los abonos y fertilizantes necesarios para cuidar de estos en esta nueva temporada y lograr una mejor cosecha este nuevo año.
texts.en:
Doña Dominga, thanks to her first loan, managed to buy the needed fertilisers which were put in her coffee plants and which performed their function very well, protecting the plant, the beans and ensuring that the soil remained in good condition. She also managed to pay for qualified labour to assist her with planting, clearing weeds from the property, and buying supplies. Thanks to this, her coffee production was a success, managing to sell the beans at a very good price in the market and to intermediaries in the region, which allowed her to obtain income that was used to pay her loan and other commitments.

She is now requesting assistance from Kiva investors to once again invest in her coffee plants, which after cutting and harvesting the beans are now deteriorated and exposed to possible contagion from coffee rust, as well as plagues that may require the plants to be cut down after being damaged. Because of this reason she is requesting a new loan, with which she will buy the necessary manure and fertiliser to take care of her plants in this new season and in order to achieve a better harvest this year.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to help her coffee plants in this new season

loans.name: Idimoh

texts.ru: Идимох жительница сельского района Хуросон. Она занимается там земледелием. Она замужем за мастера, который делает ремонт в домах. У них трое детей. Их старшей дочери 8 лет, другой дочери 3 года, а маленькому сыну всего 1 годик. Они живут скромно, но счастливо. Сама Идимох в своем приусадебном участке земли занимается выращиванием  огородных культур. Как раз сейчас она готовится к очередному посеву. Так как собственного средства не хватило на покупку семян и минеральных удобрений, Идимох обратилась за кредитом. Она с надеждой ждет финансовой поддержки, чтобы успеть закончить посевные работы. В будущем Идимох намеревается еще и заняться животноводством, чтобы улучшить жизненные условия семьи.
texts.en: Idimoh is a resident of the rural Khuroson District. She practices crop farming there. She is married to a foreman who does home repairs. They have three children. Their oldest daughter is 8 years old, their other daughter is 3 years old and their youngest son is 1 year old. They live modestly but happily. On her small plot of arable land, Idimoh grows garden crops. At this very moment, she is preparing for the next round of sowing. As her personal funds are not enough to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers, Idimoh requested a loan. She hopefully awaits financial support in order to successfully finish her sowing work. Idimoh is determined to start practicing livestock breeding in the future, in order to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers to carry out sowing.

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en: As a married mother of five children, Jenilyn works hard to support her family. She has a clothing sales business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store.  Jenilyn is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy more stock of clothing to sell. She has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF and, more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing to sell

loans.name: Inna

texts.en:
Inna lives in the village of Tsovagyugh, in the Gegharkunik region. She has a vocational education and living near to the city of Sevan, one of the greatest resorts in Armenia, she has worked over the years as a cook at one of the local rest houses. She still works as a cook simultaneously in several rest houses. She also manages to run a farm. Inna has four cows, two calves, two bulls, ten sheep, a heifer, a piglet and twelve chickens in her farm. She takes care of the farm cattle by herself. Her husband died several years ago and the care of her three children and the farm since then rests with her. 

Inna does her best to earn enough money for her family’s numerous needs. She sells milk, cheese, curd, sour cream, eggs, meat, potato and greens from her farm. She works every day and does everything with the hope of better income and living conditions for her children. She is requesting a loan of 600,000 AMD in order to buy several cows (which will increase the quantity of her farm’s dairy-products) and to buy fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy several cows, which will increase the quantity of her farm’s dairy-products, and to buy fodder for her farm cattle

loans.name: Welser José

texts.es: El Sr. Welser trabaja para una institucion publica desde hace 8 años como responsable de caja, actualmente este credito lo requiere para la compra de materiales de construccion como zinc, cemento, ladrillos y perlines, ya que fue afectado su casa de habitacion en los dormitorios el techo y paredes con los temblores que en el mes de abril 2014 ocurrieron en la zona donde habita, agradece a ceprodel por el apoyo brindado al facilitarle este credito con lo podra mejorar su casa y darle mejores condiciones de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en: Welser has worked for a public institution for eight years as the head of the cashier’s office. He is requesting this loan to buy construction materials such as zinc, cement, bricks and purlins to repair the rooms, roof and walls of his house, which was affected by the earth tremors that occurred in his area in April 2014. He is grateful to CEPRODEL for the support they have provided him by facilitating this loan, with which he will improve his house and his children’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as zinc, cement, bricks and purlins.

loans.name: Celestina

texts.pt: A Senhora vive numa casa propria com dois filhos, todos e estudar. É comerciante, comercializa tomate no mercado grossista de zimpeto(Maputo). Tem comprado tomate na Africa do sul. Com o presente  empréstimo pretende aumentar o seu volume de negócio, aumentando as quantidades de tomate porque é mais lucrativo em maiores quantidades devido ao custo de transporte, ela precisa ter quantidades que possam encher o camião para lhe sair em conta o negócio. Tem como sonho terminar a obra da sua casa no outro bairro com melhores condições de saneamento. Profissinalmente almeja comprar uma viatura para o transporte das mercadorias e não depender mais dos carros de aluguer.
texts.en: Celestina lives with her two children in a house that she owns. All her children attend school. She's a vendor who sells tomatoes at the wholesale market of Zimpeto (in Maputo). She's been buying tomatoes in South Africa. With the current loan she intends to increase turnover in her business by purchasing more tomatoes, since it's more profitable to do so in larger quantities. Because of transportation costs, she needs to get enough to fill a truckload in order to make a good deal. Her dream is to finish building her house in another neighborhood with better sanitation. In terms of her work, her goal is to buy a vehicle for carrying her merchandise so that she no longer depends on rental cars.

loans.use: to increase turnover in her business by purchasing more tomatoes.

loans.name: Las Flores De Buenos Aires Group

texts.es: Los socios del grupo  “LAS FLORES DE BUENOS AIRES”  se siente muy   satisfechos por encontrarse pasando 06 ciclo. Luzmila  tiene 44 años de edad es soltera con un hijo de 25 años de edad. Ella compra helados al por mayor para luego expenderlos al  por menor. Ya que tuvo como motivación a su madre. Años atrás vendía ropa en forma ambulatoria. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más helados. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado.  Luzmila es la segunda del lado derecho.
texts.en:
The members of the group Las Flores De Buenos Aires feel very pleased to find themselves on their 6th loan. Luzmila is 44 years old, single, and has a son that is 25 years old. She buys ice cream at wholesale to then sell at retail. She has had her mother as her motivation. Years ago she sold clothing as a street vendor. She will use this loan to buy more ice cream. 

The group thanks Kiva lenders for the loans provided. Luzmila is second from the right.

loans.use: to buy more ice cream.

loans.name: Juan Rafael

texts.es: El sr. Juan trabaja para una empresa privada desde hace 2 años como obrero (estibador, actualmente este credito lo requiere para la compra de materiales de construccion como zinc, cemento, ladrillos y perlines, ya que fue afectada su casa de habitacion sufrio daños menores en lo que es el domitorio y la cocina con los temblores que en el mes de abril 2014 ocurrieron en la zona donde habita, agradece a ceprodel por el apoyo brindado al facilitarle este credito con lo podra mejorar su casa y darle mejores condiciones de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en: Juan works for a private enterprise and has been there for 2 years. He currently needs this loan in order to purchase construction materials like zinc, cement, bricks and perlin beams. His home suffered some damages in the bedroom and the kitchen because of the recent earthquakes in April. He is thankful for the support offered by this loan because he will be able to repair the house and give better living conditions to his children.

loans.use: repair the bedroom and kitchen.

loans.name: Sahr  M

texts.en: This is 42-year-old Sahr. He is married and has two children aged 16 and 11 years. In 2011 Sahr established his tailoring materials and accessories business. He began his business because he was born in the Kono district diamond area. His father was a diamond miner. He was in high school when he dropped out. His parents encouraged him to go back to school but he refused. He dreamed of being a miner like his father and hoped to become rich at an early age. Several years later he realized that the decision he made was not a good one. He joined his elder sister's husband in business, where he made commissions from good business transactions and saved to set up his own little business. Through hard work and commitment he was able to have his own petty business. Years of experience in business has helped him improve a lot. He is hoping to concentrate on strengthening his business and taking good care of his children. He has one major competitor that is a challenge to his business, though they are in cordial relation. He is a hardworking and honest businessman. He thanks ARD, as the loan will help him buy goods that are in great demand. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about SLL 1,703,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 4,000,000. Sahr requires a loan in order to purchase assorted tailoring materials and accessories. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy assorted tailoring materials and accessories

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more jeans and t-shirts

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is 58 years old and married with five children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  

Veronica has a food-vending business in the Philippines. Veronica requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food business.

Veronica has been in this business for four years. In the future, Veronica would like to save enough money in order to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Maria Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda tiene 54 años de edad trabaja vendiendo productos plásticos que los consigue a bajo precio en una cuidad lejana y puede ofrecerlos a sus clientes en el lugar que ella reside, esta señora es casada y tiene 2  hijos los que los educo gracias a su esfuerzo y al de su esposo, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos plásticos y ofrecer más variedad a sus clientes, su  aspiración es que su negocio se mejore y de esta manera pagar la deuda de una casa que adquirieron para vivir dignamente.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 54 years old. She works selling plastic products which she gets at a low price in a city far away and can offer them to her customers in the place where she lives. This woman is married and has 2 children whom she educated thanks to her and her husband's efforts.

She is going to use this loan to buy plastic products and offer more variety to her customers. Her dream is for her business to improve and this way pay the mortgage of a house that they acquired to live decently.

loans.use: to buy plastic products.

loans.name: Kausar

texts.en: At the age of 45, Kausar is a married woman. She sells cloth in her locality. She buys cloth in different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. She is requesting a 45,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. Kausar expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend the part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Gulfareen

texts.en: Gulfareen is a 53-year-old married woman and mother of four children. The man shown in the photo is Gulfareen‘s son who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now he requires a loan for the payment of the remaining amount of his rickshaw. For this reason, Gulfareen has applied for a loan of PKR 50,000 from Kashf Foundation for her son. He wants to purchase new tires and some auto spare parts for his vehicle. Gulfareen is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her son and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to help her son purchase new tires and some auto spare parts.

loans.name: Orlanda

texts.pt: A Senhora  vive numa casa propria com três filhos. Trabalha no Centro de Saude local. Com o presente  empréstimo vai adiquirir material de construção, nomeadamente cimento, pedra, ferros e chapas de zinco. Tem como sonho ter a sua casa terminada e com melhores condições habitacionais, e contruir dependencias no mesmo terreno para arrendamento como maneira de incrimentar a sua renda familiar, e em termos profissionais espera aumentar mais conhecimentos para melhor se aplicar no seu trabalho.
texts.en: Orlanda lives with three of her children in a house that she owns. She works at the local health centre. With the current loan she'll purchase construction supplies, namely cement, rocks, iron and zinc sheets. Her dream is to finish her house and improve her living conditions. She also dreams of building an outhouse in the same plot of land so that she can rent it out as a way of increasing her family's income. In terms of her career, she hopes to gain more knowledge in order to perform better in her work.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies, namely cement, rocks, iron and zinc sheets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers and manure and to pay for labor to help maintain her coffee fields.

loans.name: Jeovany Alexander

texts.es:
Jeovany, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos, acuicultura, crianza de cerdos y ganado, su negocio ya cuenta con 10 años de estar funcionando, trabaja de 6:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m., su ventaja es que cuenta con terrenos propios en los que posee fuentes de agua para la pecera, realiza dichas actividades con la colaboración de su compañera de vida. Vive en compañía de su compañera de vida y su hijo de un año de edad.
El crédito lo invertirá en compra de ganado, concentrado para cerdos y dará mantenimiento a  la pecera, con lo que continuara trabajando y teniendo los ingresos con los que cubrirá los gastos tanto de su familia como los de su negocio.
Su sueño es seguir luchando para tener un negocio más estable que le dé una rentabilidad mayor para garantizar un mejor futuro para su familia y la cancelación de su deuda.
texts.en:
Jeovany makes his living through growing basic grains, aquaculture, and raising pigs and livestock.  His business has been going for ten years.  He works from 6:00a.m. to 4:00p.m.  He has the advantage of owning his own land, which has a water source for the fish pond.  He completes his work together with his wife.  Jeovany lives with his wife and their one-year old son
The loan will be invested in the purchase of livestock and pig feed and to provide maintenance to the fish pond.  This all will allow Joevany to continue working and earning an income that will cover not only his household expenses but the costs incurred by his business as well. 
Jeovany's dream is to keep working toward having a more stable business that offers greater profitability, which will guarantee a better future for his family and repayment of his debt.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and pig feed and to provide maintenance for his fish pond.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase carrot seeds, fertilizers and plant protection products.

loans.name: El Progreso De Patria Group

texts.es: Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “El Progreso de Patria” en el poblado de Patria. Carmen Rosa tiene 29 años de edad y vive en el poblado de Patria, ella es una persona responsable y amable que sale adelante pues su actividad económica principal es la agricultura pues tiene varios terrenos de cultivos como frutas y cereales y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar abono y otras cosas. Este banco comunal está conformado por varias personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los socios se dedican a la agricultura, venta de madera, venta de ropa, venta de comida, a la crianza de animales menores, a la construcción de casas y otras cosas más. Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. (El poblado de Patria se destaca por el comercio de productos de la selva, así como servicios de alojamiento y restaurantes. Punto de ingreso al Parque Nacional del Manu.)
texts.en: A group of neighbors and friends make up the communal bank called “El Progreso de Patria” (Patria's Progress), which is located in the town of Patria.  Carmen Rosa is 29-years old and lives in Patria.  She is a responsible and friendly person who has been able to get ahead.  Her main financial activity is farming.  She has a few plots of land where she grows fruits and cereals.  At this time, Carmen Rosa needs the loan to purchase compost and other items.  The communal bank is made up of a number of people who are constantly looking for opportunities to get ahead and, with their daily hard work, to give a better future to their children.  The other members of the communal bank make their livings in agriculture, selling wood, clothing sales, selling food, raising small animals, building houses etc.   The members are all grateful for the opportunity being offered, and they promise to each pay back their loans in their individually established time frames.  (Patria is known for its products from the jungle as well as its lodging and restaurants.  It is the point of entry to Manu National Park).

loans.use: to purchase compost.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en: Naseem is a 47-year-old vigorous, married woman. She has had a business doing hand embroidery for many years. She is zealous about her work, and client demand is strong. But business challenges, combined with family expenses, frustrate her nearly every day. Naseem’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street, and she is the best earning resource in her household. She is a mother of five children. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins, and pearls in large quantities. This will help her to meet the increasing demand. She is in her sixth loan cycle and has good credit history.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins, and pearls

loans.name: Ghazala

texts.en: Ghazala, age 41, is a married woman.  She has a business selling animals. She buys animals such as baby goats at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She needs to improve her business to help cover her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase more baby goats. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. She is in her fifth loan cycle and has good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more used clothing for her business.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 28 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Rosalinda's house was destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines November 8, 2013. She has restarted her livestock raising and is committed to regain what she lost. Rosalinda is taking out a PHP 8,900 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build her a house for her family.

Rosalinda has been with NWTF since 2012 in her pursuit to rise out of poverty. With your help, she will be able to start once more in a new home. In the future, Rosalinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Jennsy Mercedes

texts.es:
La sonrisa de Jennsy  transmite a sus pacientes confianza y seguridad. No hay duda que es una excelente psicóloga.  Su esfuerzo, dedicación y empeño  valieron  la pena. Se ha convertido en una excelente profesional. Sus metas no finalizan aquí, ella planea continuar  sus  estudios superiores  haciendo  una maestría en Psicología Clínica.
Su propósito es lograr abrir su propio consultorio.  Cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres, sin embargo, para alcanzar su objetivo necesitará de un financiamiento, de esa forma logrará  finalizar sus estudios sin problema alguno. Ella solicitó un préstamo en  el programa Educrédito de KIVA para la realizacion de su maestria en Psicología Clínica,ya que esta institución apoya a los jóvenes con deseos de superación y metas como ella.
texts.en:
Jennsy's smile conveys trust and assurance to her patients.  There is no doubt that she is an excellent psychologist.  Her efforts, dedication and hard work have been worthwhile, because she has become an excellent professional.  But her goals don't stop here; she plans to continue her college studies toward a Master's degree in Clinical Psychology.

Jennsy's goal is to open her own practice.  She has the support of her parents.  However, to reach this goal she will need some financing so that she can finish her degree without any problems.  She is requesting a loan through Kiva's education lending program so that she can obtain her Master's in Clinical Psychology, because this institution supports young people like her who have goals and the desire to succeed.

loans.use: to earn a Master's degree in Clinical Psychology

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more pepper, rice, oil, salt, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
Maria Isabel tiene 47 años de edad, ella es casada y madre de 6 hijos los cuales todos dependen de ella. Junto a su esposo trabajan duro para salir adelante siendo ellos quienes se encarguen del mantenimiento de sus cultivos de café realizando tareas como corte del grano, aplicación de abono, fertilizantes, foliares, entre otros que ayudan al fortalecimiento del mismo. Sus cultivos de café al final de cada temporada son la fuente de ingresos que da el sustento a su familia mediante la venta del grano pues en su familia y la de su esposo ha sido medio durante muchas generaciones ya que en la comunidad donde habitan la única fuente de empleo y de ingresos para las diferentes familias es el trabajo de campo.
Maria Isabel solicita apoyo financiero en esta nueva temporada para asistir sus cultivos de café invirtiendo en el mantenimiento la cual incluye la aplicación de los fertilizantes, abonos, limpieza, pago de mano de obra logrando de esta manera reforzar y obtener mejores resultados sobre su cosecha. Como productora de café sus planes a futuro ampliar más sus cultivos pues en la actualidad compro una manzana de tierra inculta y sus planes para este nuevo año es cultivarla de café y así poder contar con 2 manzanas y mejores resultados en este nuevo año.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel is 47-years old.  She is married and the mother of six dependent children.  Maria Isabel and her husband work hard to get ahead.  They are the ones who take care of maintaining the coffee crop.  They cut the beans and apply the compost, fertilizer, nutrients and other items that help to strengthen the plants.  At the end of each season, their coffee crop provides the income that supports their family.  Selling the coffee beans has provided income for Maria Isabel's family and her husband's family for many generations.  In their community, the only employment and source of income for the various families is working in the fields. 
Maria Isabel is requesting financial assistance in this new season to help her coffee crop.  She will invest in maintaining the crop, including applying the fertilizers and compost, cleaning the fields and paying for labor.  Her crop will then be stronger and give them better results at harvest time.  As a coffee producer, Maria Isabel's futures plans are to expand her crop even more.  She currently has purchased a block of uncultivated land.  Her plans for this new year are to plant it with coffee and to acquire two more blocks of land for better results in this new year.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies to help with her coffee crop.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit is 55 years old and lives in Vanadzor city in the Lori region. She lives with her son’s family. Her son now works in the Russian Federation, and from there he transfers money to sustain his family’s needs. 

Anahit greatly helps her son to solve their family’s financial problems; she has her own business, and in her shop she sells flowers. Every day, early in the morning, she buys flowers from the local wholesale market and makes bouquets, decorates them, and sells them. Thanks to her cheerful character, polite way of service, and most important, cheap prices, her business brings good income to her family.

Anahit asks for this loan in order to buy a new assortment of flowers for her business and also some special medicine that helps the flowers to stay fresh longer. 

She greatly hopes that thanks to her business’ good income, her son will be back finally and never leave them for such a long period of time. They will run this business together and have better living conditions in their native city.

loans.use: to buy a new assortment of flowers for her business and also some special medicine that helps the flowers to stay fresh longer.

loans.name: Mirna Isabel

texts.es:
Mirna, ha seguido creciendo con su negocio gracias a los financiamientos que ha invertido en el, tiene mejores ingresos con los que ha podido ofrecer un mejor estilo de vida a su familia e incluir la venta de pupusas y meriendas.
En esta oportunidad solicita capital para comprar jugos, golosinas, pan, papas, yuca, harina, chicharrón, gaseosas, repollo, tomates, aceite para cubrir las necesidades de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mirna's business has continued to grow thanks to the loans that she has invested in it. She has more income, with which she has been able to provide a better life for her family and incorporate the sale of pupusas [thick, stuffed corn tortillas] and snacks.

This time, she is requesting funds to purchase juice, candy, bread, potatoes, yucca, flour, pork cracklings, soda, cabbage, tomatoes, and cooking oil to provide for her clients' needs.

loans.use: to purchase juice, candy, bread, potatoes, yucca, flour, pork cracklings, soda, cabbage, tomatoes, and cooking oil

loans.name: Franklin Javier

texts.es: El Sr. Franklin trabaja para una emoresa publica desde hace 6 años como guarda de seguridad actualmente este credito lo requiere para la compra de materiales de construccion como zinc, perlines y mano de obra, ya que fue afectado su casa de habitacion  en la parte del techo que era de teja, con los temblores que en el mes de abril 2014 ocurrieron, agradece a ceprodel por el apoyo brindado al facilitarle este credito con lo podra mejorar su casa y darle mejores condiciones de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Franklin has worked for a public company for the past six years, where he is currently security guard. He needs this loan to purchase construction materials, such as zinc, purlins, and labor, because the tile roof of his house was affected by the earthquakes that occurred in April 2014.

He is grateful to Ceprodel for the support that they offer by facilitating this loan, with which he will be able to improve his house and provide better living conditions to his children.

loans.use: to purchase roofing materials

loans.name: Belen

texts.en:
Belen is 44-years-old, married with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Belen has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Belen requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell.

Belen has been in this business for five years. In the future, Belen would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Mupa

texts.en:
